## Row {.flow}

```{python}

ui.h1("Title")

@render.code
def greeting():
    return f"Hello, world!\nIt's currently {time()}."
  
@reactive.calc
def time():
    reactive.invalidate_later(1)
    return datetime.now()

ui.h1("Calculate")

ui.input_slider("x", "Slider value", min=0, max=100, value=10)
ui.input_action_button("compute", "Compute!")

@reactive.calc
async def result():
    return f"Result: {input.x()}"
```
